name: 12 Seconds of Terror
description:
SGDA Fall 2015 Game Jam

Theme: 12

Controls: Spacebar to jump, A and D for left and right, E to hide between alleyways, F to attack when a werewolf.

Take control of a man who forcibly transforms into a wolf every night for 12 seconds. Kill the villagers as a werewolf, avoid them as a human. Survive as long as you can before you get captured!
